text: Alex Livingston is a Canadian poker player. In 2019 he placed 3rd in the World Series of Poker Main Event. He also finished 13th at the Main Event in 2013. Livingston was raised in Halifax, Nova Scotia. He is also a chess player and attended Tufts University. Away from the tables Alex is an avid skier, golfer and writer. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Canadian poker players Category:Canadian chess players Category:Tufts University alumni Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Alex Livingston
